title: How to unwind to get a better sleep - Quora
tags: Tips and Hacks for Everyday Life

response.answer_text: Magnesium bath for 20 mins to absorb it, diffuse essential oils, herbal tea, listen to relaxing music, have nice bedding and pillows, down comforter, a coolish, dark bedroom, air purifier going. Sometimes I read in bed, books not screens.
What works for me is reading, watching TV, or playing solitaire on the computer. I take magnesium in the morning and at bedtime which relaxes me and helps me fall asleep.
